column6: "FANTASTIC VOYAGE" pts. 1 & 2 (of 3) The Exiles encounter an alternate world version of the Fantastic Four! But a startling secret at the heart of this FF may mean devastation for our heroes! 32 PGS. (each)/MARVEL PSR...$2.99 (each)
